text:
@HuXijin_GT LoL. you people gave birth to the Wuhan Coronavirus 'Kung-FLU'
You seems to have touched the wrong nerve this time, India isn't Taiwan, Hong-Kong, etc.
Even your Tibetan occupancy is in grave danger now. 
India never a share border with China, instead with Tibet, just a reminder

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.
